entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: East Point 07:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
